title: Smart Choice Communications Readies for Hurricane Joaquin, Expects No Problems With Telecommunications Services
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Smart Choice Communications Readies for Hurricane Joaquin, Expects No Problems With Telecommunications Services Smart Choice Communications has put its Inbound Disaster Recovery (IDR) in place to ensure telecommunications services continue as usual and are uninterrupted. The network is designed to provide reliable connections regardless of the weather. NEW YORK, NY, October 03,   National Weather Service has recently upgraded Tropical Storm Joaquin to a Hurricane. As your telecommunications provider, we are writing to let you know that our company already has its Inbound Disaster Recovery (IDR) procedures in place. Rest assured, Hurricane Joaquin will not affect our normal day-to-day operations. As always, we provide 24/7/365 support with operations personnel on standby for your convenience. Our network is designed to be highly reliable and efficient even through weather events such as this. Don't forget, as a SCC customer, you have access to benefits such as Voicemail to Email, Auto-Attendant, Toll Free Number, and Call Forwarding so you can be reached at any time. At SCC, we value and appreciate your confidence in us regarding your telecommunications and networking needs. If you have any questions, or require assistance at any time, please do not hesitate to contact our support center at 800-217-3096 or e-mail info@smartchoiceus.com. Thank you and we hope you are safe during this time.As a full-service ISP, Cloud PBX, SIP, Infrastructure Management, and World Wide Smart Hands services provider, SCC helps hundreds of thousands of enterprise users to grow and maintain their businesses with zero downtime and cutover care. Our U.S.-based engineering team watches over your network 24/7/365 using our superior standards to ensure you have 100% uptime. # # #
